sentences.sContent: Due to his intrepidity he may be the last hope of the village.
sentences.sContent_eng: Due to his intrepidity he may be the last hope of the village.
sentences.sCn: 因为由于他的无畏他可能是村幸免的最后一个希望。

sentences.sContent: Uprisings, while proving popular intrepidity, also educated the courage of the bourgeois.
sentences.sContent_eng: Uprisings, while proving popular intrepidity, also educated the courage of the bourgeois.
sentences.sCn: 暴动表现了人民的无畏精神，同时也锻炼了资产阶级的勇气。

sentences.sContent: The acceptance of the death agony in the flower of youth and in the flush of health turns intrepidity into frenzy.
sentences.sContent_eng: The acceptance of the death agony in the flower of youth and in the flush of health turns intrepidity into frenzy.
sentences.sCn: 在年轻力壮的时候去接受死亡，这使大无畏的精神变为疯狂。
